display_long_description:
Fly. Upgrade. Go even farther.

In this immersive VR flying experience, your only goal is simple: reach the finish line. But how far you go depends on the plane you build. Every flight earns you money, and that money lets you upgrade your aircraft piece by piece — making it fly farther, stay airborne longer, and unlock new breathtaking environments.

Each new level introduces a completely fresh look for your plane and a unique themed world to explore. Soar through playful playgrounds, glide above busy cities, and push the limits of flight in ever-changing skies. With every upgrade, your plane evolves — becoming sleeker, stronger, and more capable of breaking distance records.

This isn’t just flying — it’s progression. How far can your creation go?

• Complete each level by reaching the finish line
• Earn money by flying as far as possible
• Upgrade your plane to improve distance and performance
• Discover new environments and themes every level
• Experience the thrill of progression in full VR

Progress. Evolution. Flight.
How far can you take your plane?
